title: How do I level up in boards?
body: I'm lvl 41 in the game but it won't let me comment or vote on boards. It says I need to be lvl 10 or higher. How do I level up?

replies.body: Nvm I just leveled up it takes a while..
Posting in Help and Support (which doesn't have a level limit) updates your level on boards :) I think up voting a post also does it but I'm not totally sure on that one.
Can confirm! Upvoting also syncs Boards profiles, along with posting threads and commenting on posts (:
